Posts.Content: Ann20, While I agree that big Pharma is filling their coffees, I disagree about pushing their “Poisons”. If it weren’t for the research on drugs, I would be dead! You see Ann20, I am one if the few thst need their “Poison “ to survive. Natural path poisin does not wirk for me. If the natural path poison snake and oil medicine man pushed their stuff on me, I would be DEAD!
Posts.Title: A new collaboration, "Patient Perspectives," to amplify patients' voices

Posts.Content: Ann20, so we all stop taking drugs on your recommendation then we can die and you won’t have to worry about us anymore!
